{
    "number": 241861,
    "data": "2,5,188286357631,15018933029959449607893431916515023,1643356469972045002664087635582629208716484341598400533",
    "name": "Primes of the form 2*3^n - n.",
    "comment": [
        "Generated by n = 0, 1, 23, 71, 113,.. - _Michel Marcus_, May 11 2014",
        "No other terms for n < 100000. - _Jens Kruse Andersen_, May 19 2014"
    ],
    "example": [
        "2 is in this sequence because 2*3^0 - 0 = 2."
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Select[Table[2 3^n - n, {n, 0, 300}], PrimeQ] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oc 21 2014 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(MAGMA) [a: n in [0..150] | IsPrime(a) where a is 2*3^n - n]; // _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Apr 30 2014"
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "_Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Apr 30 2014",
    "references": 1,
    "revision": 32,
    "time": "2014-10-21T12:38:55-04:00",
    "created": "2014-05-17T04:04:51-04:00"
}
